entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.9°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
